description: This superfood side dish is packed with greens and mildly seasoned.
name: Kale & Spinach Couscous Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 small white onion, peeled and diced

recipeInstructions.text: Place the couscous and 400ml of the vegetable stock in a pot and bring to the boil, allow to simmer for 25 minutes.
Heat up a pan to a medium heat the canola oil and fry the onion and garlic for 4 minutes.
Add the spinach, kale and seasoning to the pan and toss while cooking for 1 more minute before removing from the heat.
Once the pearl couscous is cooked, remove from the heat and allow to cool slightly.
Combine the couscous with the rest of the ingredients before serving.
